overview_of_class: The course provides an in-depth introduction to the analysis and interpretation of data. We'll walk through basic statistical concepts to understand and analyze patterns in data. By the end of the course, students will be able to conduct analysis on data sets and will be ready to undertake a senior thesis, if interested.
name: Analysis and Interpretation of Social Data
class_attributes:
Formal Studies Distro Area

Prerequisites apply, see description
subject: SOCIOL
